name: Special edition Supersonic Nural hair dryer in Strawberry bronze and blush pink
about: What it is:A special-edition hair dryer that protects the scalp from heat and remembers your styling routine..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Protects your scalp barrier from extreme heat, helping to maintain your scalp's moisture levels.What Else You Need to Know:This special edition Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer in strawberry bronze and blush pink has a complimentary Presentation case. The tool features a network of Nural sensors that automatically adjust airflow and temperature to enhance natural shine and protect scalp health.u00b9.Features:- A new network of Nural sensors within the machine activate intelligent features automatically to optimize your styling routine..Key Controls:- Scalp Protect Button: When on, it automatically lowers heat when the machine is close to the scalp. When off, it allows you to manually choose your heat setting..Includes:- Wave+Curl diffuser, a new format diffuser that disperses airflow in two different ways: Dome mode draws air into the dome and infuses it through the hair to enhance natural waves or curls for a more defined finish;u2074 Diffuse mode gently disperses airflow through longer prongs for voluminous curls and coils.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Styling Tips:.-Start with clean, wet hair..-For a smooth look, use the Gentle Air attachment in Scalp Protect mode to rough dry roots before styling. .-Section hair and use the Styling Concentrator and a round brush to style one section at a time. .-Once hair is dry, use the Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish..-Enhance your natural curl pattern with two modes using the Wave+Curl diffuser. .-Separate the prongs from the center of the diffuser for Dome mode to create natural waves or use in Diffuse mode for textured curls.
